scripts.test:e2e: start-server-and-test "npm run dev:3005" http://localhost:3005 "cypress run --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3005"
scripts.test:e2e:matching: start-server-and-test "npm run dev:3005" http://localhost:3005 "cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/matching-flow.cy.js --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3005"
scripts.test:e2e:pulse: start-server-and-test "npm run dev:3005" http://localhost:3005 "cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/proximity-feed.cy.js --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3005"

scripts.test:e2e:chatrooms: start-server-and-test "npm run dev:3005" http://localhost:3005 "cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/proximity-chatrooms.cy.js --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3005"
scripts.test:e2e:messaging: start-server-and-test "npm run dev:3005" http://localhost:3005 "cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/messaging-flow.cy.js --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3005"
scripts.test:e2e:physical: start-server-and-test "npm run dev:3005" http://localhost:3005 "cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/physical-profile.cy.js --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3005"
scripts.test:e2e:face-reveal: start-server-and-test "npm run dev -- -p 3007" http://localhost:3007 "cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/face-reveal.cy.js --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3007"
